column5: Could someone give directions to the beer store in Ft. Frances from the border crossing. Also, directions from the beer store to highway #502 to Dryden would be helpfull. Thanks
Hi MookieCheck out this website - http://www.thebeerstore.caClick on stores / products - and enter the area you are looking for - let me know how it works.
Hey Mookie, where are you coming from? I have a great map i could send you over e-mail. Just let me know.
Paul,thanks for the web info. cool website, didn't know they had one, unfortunately it just gives addresses for the stores, not directions. it will come in handy for pre-selection. thanks again.
schmegger,i would like to take you up on your offer for a map.email address: [email protected]thanks for your help.

After you clear customs in canada,head east to your first set of lights,turn left head straight north for 4 blocks. You will be at the LCBO.then you head east for 1 block turn left go under the under pass then turn right head east for 1/2 block and you will find the beer store. The gang at the beer store will point in the right direction after that.Have a great trip.I stole the info from a previous post in April.
